comment: I loved him. Really easy. Lots of work but easy to pass if you do the work. Very funny

Awesome professor! He stops when you raise your hand for help! Gives classes the option of an hour help on friday! His tests are not very hard if you study& do the homework. I am not good in math but I understood it in his class! Took his class at 7:30 and I am not a morning person but never missed a class!! TAKE HIM!!

Prof Hoover is the best teacher I have ever had. Extremely helpful and will work with you in class and out of class to make sure you understand the subject. Calculus isn't easy, but he puts it into the simplest terms possible. You are not going to find a calc class you can breeze thru, so you might as well take the best teacher you can find.

Professor Hoover is an outstanding teacher! His tests are pretty hard, but he gives partial credit. Make sure you go to class even though notes are posted online. He is a very nice professor and cares about his students. I recommend him to all my friends.

Mr. Hoover is the best teacher I have EVER had. He really cares about the well-being of all his students. He is extremely clear and understanding in his teaching and what he wants you to know. He has a good sense of humor and he's the sweetest old man you will ever meet. TAKE HIM IF YOU CAN!! He is outstanding.

Excellent professor, strongly recommend! He is very clear with his notes and teaching methods. He gives a lot of extra credit, and there are lots of grades giving you many opportunities to bring your final grade up. Overall, I loved this class and would take a class with him again in the future.

I have never put so much effort into one class before!  The material in this class is extremely challenging.  Mr. Hoover is a really sweet man, but his tests and quizzes are very challenging! Be ready to work really  hard! I have never made a B in any math class I have ever taken, but I did in this class!

Very Difficult class unless you're good at math. Nice professor but test and quizes are definitely not easy. Takes a lot of time and study to do good in this class. Will help you if you need it. (Caution: Beware of his chain saw)
Nice guy. Will help you if you need it but test and quizes are veryyyy challenging.

Mr. Hoover is an wonderful professor and I will highly recommend him.  He starts the class with a funny math related newspaper comic and is always available when you need a little extra help with the material.  After taking a break from college and not having had a math class in 5 years, he made Calculus easy for me :)

Mr. Hoover was so good I had to say something. This was my second time attempting Calculus as my first teacher was awful. Although Mr. Hoover's tests are pretty hard but he gives very fair partial credit(I got 6 of 8 pts on some problems I didn't even get the right answer for) He gives mandatory graded homework but it is 100% relevant to classwork.

He was probably the best math teacher/professor/mentor I have really had. If you put forth the effort , he takes notice and tries to help you out where possible. Extra credit for the class and bonus questions on the exams. He helps you understand and make sense of the math in the class. I recommend to all student whether you are math smart or not.
AWESOME TEACHER! Very Helpful!Easy to understand! He drops lowest quiz grade ... Lot of extra credit opportunitys..
Mr. Hoover is the best!  If you really want to learn Calculus take his course.  You still have to work hard, but you'll learn a lot.  (also, his grading is very fair)

Mr. Hoover is a sweet guy and very helpful.  He gets a peeved when people don't complete MyMathLab on time.  He likes to tell stories when he should be teaching class. There is not enough instruction time as it is.  You are going to have to teach yourself the material unless you just get math like some people do. Quizzes and Exams are tricky.

I don't normally post here, but Mr.Hoover deserves it. If you want to learn Calc you need to search for his class. He is an AMAZING teacher. Very capable of conveying knowledge, and always available. I think you can sum it up by saying that Mr. Hoover really cares!!  (btw this is still calculus you have to do the work)

Was the greatest teacher I have ever taken! He is kind and very helpful. He is always avaliable for help. He does not discriminate against you if you miss a few classes. There are buffer grades that really help. After taking his class I changed my major to math ed because I want to be able to teach people as well as he taught me. TAKE HIM!

Must take this teacher! As an adult learner, Mr Hoover was the best teacher I could possibilly have asked for. Very patient, helpful and has a true passion for teaching his students. I now want to become a Math teacher!

He is a great teacher and is such a nice guy. I tended to get really bored in the class because he would go over simple concepts very slowly or get way off topic for half the class time. His tests were sometimes a little tricky, but he is always willing to help you further understand. And DONT BUY THE TEXTBOOK!!! absolutely no need for it

Mr. Hoover is an awesome teacher! i took his class at 8am and the only thing keepin me awake was his enthusiasm! He's a really good teacher and as long as you pay attention you will do good! The test and quizzes were really easy!
Possibly the best professor I've had. Very understanding of students, crazy patience, and will go out of his way to help anybody. Take this guy for math if possible, you will not regret.

I hope that I will be as good a math teacher as Mr. Hoover.  He is patient, exact, and logical.  He anticipates the pitfalls for students, and helps to guide them accordingly.  Go to class, do the homework, and you'll do fine.  More importantly, you'll come out with a solid foundation in Calculus.

Prof. Hoover is what everybody in the teaching profession should try to model after. He cares about his students, explains the subject clearly, is  extremely nice and patient, yet he still expects you to put in effort and try. He would probably teach for free if he could. You can tell he loves teaching that much.

He is the best teacher you can take for a Calc 1 class.  He has a good pace and is very clear when he lectures.  No surprises in the tests; they come right from the homework problems.  Homework is very crucial and you cannot pass the class without doing it!  Assignments boost your grade up.  Easy A, if you do the homework and ask questions.
He is such a sweet man!  Very fun, personable, funny...and he's very helpful!  He loves it when you come by his office to chat, and is always willing to help.  TAKE HIM!!!
starts every class with a comic strips that always makes you laugh and very helpful TAKE HIM loved his class, always willing to help

This professor is quite good at what he does. He's very easy to understand and as long as you do the homework, you'll do well in the class. I hadn't taken a math class in a while and he made all the material easy to understand and was always eager to provide assisstance to his students if needed. He's also pretty friendly and a funny guy.

Hey is a really good professor, so if you can take him. If you do your homework and go to class you would do very good in his class. He is also a very funny and nice man and very helpful if you dont understand. you have 3 test and quizes. pretty much he is AWESOME! :) take him

The cutest little old man, really passionate about what he's teaching and the best prof to have in the mornings! Wont bore you, but wont move too fast. Really willing to help.. Homework and practice tests/quizes required but still helpful. Quiz over homewrk everyday so DO IT! Review day before every test.
Hoover gives too much home work and that leaves no time for other classes. Teaches one way only.

Most amazing math teacher i have EVER had!! he has a love for teaching, and loves to see his students suceed. You never see this man without a smile. He is wonderful. If you ever need help just go by his office.

Mr Hoover is my hero. He has to be one of the greatest teachers i've ever had. This man knows his stuff and the way he explains things guarantees that you will know it too. He makes everything just make sense. You have to do your homework, but he's a great guy and he will answer all questions, and ensure that you understand. He cares about students

He is one of the best teachers I have ever had. He can explain things to anyone, regardless of how they learn. He made calculus simple and applicable for me. I wish he taught Calc 2 so I could have him again. He ACTUALLY cares about his students!

Great teacher, make sure you do the homework and you will be fine. He does not take homework as a grade but at the test he takes up a portfolio type thing with quizzes and homework in it.  Gives daily quizzes, which if you do the homework you will be fine. I would recommend him to anyone, and he is the most caring teacher i ever met.
good

Mr. Hoover is an incredible teacher.  He still cares about the subjects he teaches but more importantly he cares about the students.  If you go to class and do all of your my mathlab homework you will do great.  Gives practice quizes and practice tests for all tests.  If you know those you will ace the tests.  Mr. Hoover rocks!!!!!!!!
Best Professor at KSU!! Great guy, as long as you do your homework you'll do great!

I enjoyed being in Mr. Hoover's class.  At first I thought he was a little cold, then he lightened up and adored all of us.  The tests were not easy until the end, when there wasn't as much algebra.  He wants you to know the stuff well, that's for sure.

Thought class would be easy on the 1st day, but math is not my strongest subj and I got lost. I went  for help he told me I just needed to do my hw. I was lost just walking out of class nm doing the hw. This teacher is always in a good mood, but he only explains things one way. If you don't get it that way, ur out of luck. I dropped the class.

I took him for calc 2 and actually had fun in that class. He's genuinely enthusiastic about his students and teaching and he is very helpful when you ask. His tests are just difficult enough, only one of ours was "too" difficult, and he compromised with us and let us go back and redo our missed questions for bonus points. He's fantastic!

Uses the examples from the book so that if you want extra examples, don't look to the book. He's really clear on what he wants; however, if you ask him why something is, he'll tell you "because the book says so"...

Everyone says he is good but he is really strict with his Algebra stuff. I aced Precal and got a C in this course. I even hired a tutor. He explains it one way and if you don't get it o well. He also took 20pts of a test of mine because I had all the answers right on a problem and didn't "show enough work"... he will penny you to death. stay away

Mr Hoover was a great professor and is an amazing person. He made math easy to understand. Answers any questions from the book and online. You can tell he enjoys what he does. Wonderful personality and sense of humor, especially for compostitions...watch for that :)

Wonderful teacher. Highly recommend!! Goes over textbook homework but grades online homework. Tests are right inbetween hard and easy. Answers all questions and has a great personality. Took his class at 8am and still liked it.
Amazing teacher. Truly a good lecturer, he was a great professor. Very easy to make an A, yet still a challenging professor

He was very helpful in trying to get everyone to understand math.  He tried to make it fun.  He is very nice and understanding.  I recommend everyone take him for any math class.  Too bad he doesn't teach statistics.

At first, I thought the class was ok.  The material is easy but it's extremely boring.  Then he became moody and started yelling at people for absolutely nothing.  He told me that I needed to start acting like a college student when all I did in that class was take notes & more notes. Stupid...

Very cool guy. Ask about his military experience or just wait for it to come up, you wouldn't think he used to fly jets.  Tests and quizes are the only grades, homework is good practice (duh). I looked at the material once outside of class and made a B. Put forth a little bit of effort and get an A.

Hoover was one of my fav. profs! He loves teaching college kids, and you can tell! He encourages asking questions until you understand, and visits to his office. Do your homework, and you'll be fine.  I enjoyed class, even though it was calc at 7:30am!

Mr.Hoover is a great guy,but being nice and being able to teach math is too different things. It has to be considered that it has been a long time since I had any math, nor am I math oriented.I and two others dropped because we just didn't understand him.

I took his class last fall and I never thought math can be interesting. His class was fun, and exams were extremely easy. All you have to do is do some homework and be in the class. I never studied for his exams and always got easy A. So take his class!
If you're taking math classes, fight hard to get Mr. Hoover or Mrs. Burke.  Definitely the best teachers I've ever had.

Extremely nice and fun.  He trys very hard to help you understand the material.  He assigns a lot of homework, but its is all worth it.  If you do it you will do well in the class.  Even the people not doing well like him as a teacher!
One of my best professors.  Basically, go to class and do some homework and get an A.
